Dear Elisa, your story is most remarkable. I am impressed by your personal story and happy to share it with whomever I can. If you do not mind I would like to advise you to contact tatjana wilk in Munich for more support and solidarity for your fields of interest. I am certain that she would like to contact and be in your group, in addition she is organizing an interesting quantum activity in my home town. Check out their website: https://www.mcqst.de/about/members/tatjana-wilk.html> all the best for your future.By the way, TOPTICA is the company that has not only plays a major role in building atom or ion-based quantum computers today, but has also built an installed the 4 laser guide star facility at the ESO astronomy facility on cerro paranal in the atacama desert in your home country. And we are playing, using the learned lessons of atom physics, in the upper atmosphere, using chirp cooling and repumping for better fluorescence yield for detwinkling stars.
